creator: kasal@ucw.cz
text:
This:
<FilesMatch \.(?i:gif|jpe?g|png)$>
should not contain any colon, it should be a vert. bar too.

Although I haven't tested it, this appears to be proper PCRE syntax
for a case-insensitive match.  See:
http://www.pcre.org/pcre.txt

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: slive@apache.org
